item.title: 1.19 Release
item.description: A majority of the work of 1.19 is complete. We are currently in Alpha builds and have verified that all features are working as expected. To go into Beta builds and eventually into release, CraftTweaker needs to be updated to Minecraft 1.19.
item.content:encoded: A majority of the work of 1.19 is complete. We are currently in Alpha builds and have verified that all features are working as expected. To go into Beta builds and eventually into release, CraftTweaker needs to be updated to Minecraft 1.19.
